WRITING.TITLE: Is it a bad idea to be friends with my ex right after we broke up?
WRITING.TEXT: My boyfriend just broke up with me. I tried to cut him out my life but he #8217;s my only real friend and I can #8217;t do that. I #8217;m still in love with him but he doesn #8217;t have the same feelings. We #8217;ve been together for a little over a year. It #8217;s so hard to resist the urge to call him or text him. I don #8217;t know who I am anymore. He wants to have the same relationship just none of the romance part. Our relationship was perfect, he just felt like I put more time into the relationship more than he did, which is true. Is it healthier to stop talking to him or should I keep a friendship between us?
But if I #8217;m not I shouldn #8217;t be friends with him?
It #8217;s so hard to be independent after a break up. How do I learn to be happy by myself without my ex

WRITING.TITLE: Writing so I don #8217;t text him
WRITING.TEXT: I #8217;m still so in love with you. It makes me sad how you haven #8217;t been in love with my for months but never told me. I rethink every time you said I love you and how it was a lie. My heart hurts so much. Not talking to you is the hardest thing to do. I know I need to avoid communication. Hopefully you wonder how I #8217;m doing and reach out to me if you truly do feel you want to be friends with me. I don #8217;t know how to live anymore. Everything I see reminds me of you. I just stare at the wall in silence. When we talked you made it sound like the possibility of getting back together was very high, I hope you truly meant that. Your my best friend and the thought of not talking to you physically hurts me. I love you so much
I #8217;m going though the same thing right now so don #8217;t feel like your going through this alone :( :)
Fuck that hit hard god damn

WRITING.TITLE: I never want to talk to you ever again but at the same time talking to you is the only thing I want right now
WRITING.TEXT: You were the perfect boyfriend. Not abusive not toxic not controlling. For the past couple months I felt you didn #8217;t put me as your priority, which was true. We #8217;re young we shouldn #8217;t be tied down to one person. But you made me think you were in the same boat as me. You made me think we were going to be together forever. Talking about where we were gunna live our kids names the trip we were going to save up on. I knew you were excited for this trip and we #8217;re serious about it. It makes no sense. You had time to start detaching from me while I was getting even more attached. I don #8217;t want to live anymore. I feel like I #8217;m never gunna stop crying. I feel like this feeling will never go away.

I #8217;m going though a very similar experience but it #8217;s only been one day not 4 months lol. I know that #8217;s not the same but. It worries me how I #8217;ll probably be in your shoes still not over my ex in 4 months.
It doesn #8217;t feel like that day will ever come

I #8217;m so sorry he did that to you. You don #8217;t deserve that kind of treatment no one does. That #8217;s why he #8217;s not good enough for you. Be angry he #8217;s a asshole , not sad that he #8217;s not yours anymore.

I #8217;m going though a breakup too and feel like i can #8217;t talk to anyone. Which is why my sad ass resorted to reddit. I #8217;m so sorry she did that to you on your fucking birthday too. She #8217;s not worth being sad over fuck that hoe
Thank you for this. My friends have just been saying #8220;don #8217;t be sad awe #8221; and I #8217;m sick of it. Let me be sad god damit

WRITING.TITLE: Writing so I don #8217;t text him part 2
WRITING.TEXT: I replay the last kiss, the last hug, the last time we hung out. I should have held you longer, kissed you harder, stayed with you a little longer. I wish I would have known that was the last time I would say I love you. I should have done so many things differently. I want to go back in time, I just want to change the past. I need to stop calling you. I know I #8217;m hurting you making you listen to me cry. I #8217;m sorry I can #8217;t let go. I know what I #8217;m supposed to do but I just can #8217;t do it. I can #8217;t do this anymore
This gives me a lot of hope of moving on. Right now it seems impossible to move on personally, but the fact that others have makes me happy:)
I feel like this feeling will never come
Thank you for this advice I #8217;ll try my best. It #8217;s just hard to do the things I used to enjoy. I feel like everything I liked my ex liked. And everything reminds me of him.
But it feels like it hurts me more to not talk to him then to not talk to him. I just want to do everything to stop this pain.
It hurts more not talking to him. I just want this feeling to stop.
Don #8217;t ever feel like your going through this alone. The pain hurts and even though I don #8217;t believe it and you probably don #8217;t believe it people keep saying time will heal.
I feel like such a loser posting my feelings on here. I just feel so alone that I have to rely on strangers to help me.

I #8217;m also on day 3. It feels like this 3 day weekend is never going to end. I also work with my ex so I get exactly where your coming from. It sucks seeing them. Seeing there smile, and how happy they look, while we #8217;re here falling apart inside
I #8217;m feeling the same feelings. It really physically and mentally hurts to Love someone that doesn #8217;t love you. There #8217;s a lot of fish in the sea, but I only want that one fish.
This gives me a lot of hope. I #8217;m only on day 3 and I feel like I #8217;m never going to be able to stop. What are some things that helped you if it #8217;s ok to ask?
I get this so much. You want the pain to stop, but you know once that pain goes away they go away with it. Love fucking sucks

Wow it #8217;s almost like I wrote this myself. Living life without your significant other that you feel so attached to feels like living without half of yourself. The happiness that once was in me is gone, the strive for greatness, the want to live another day. I still can #8217;t wrap my mind around how someone can just not love someone anymore, without any specific reasons.
I really hope you find your happiness. If you ever do let me know maybe give me some pointers.

WRITING.TITLE: I just want to stop this pain
WRITING.TEXT: All day I think about you. Even when we were together I would daydream about you everyday. Now these dreams are nightmares and I want it to stop. I want to stop feeling I want to stop thinking I want to stop crying I want to stop hurting. This has been the most miserable couple days of my life. I think about just ending my life. I know I #8217;ll never do it but the fact that my head even goes there scares me. It shown how much I needed you, how weak I am without you. I #8217;m not strong enough to go through this. My body and mind is crumbling. I don #8217;t think I can take much of this anymore
Fuck the sushi thing hit me hard because that was our favorite thing to eat together. And I can #8217;t listen to music without him coming to mind. How long did it take you for the pain to subside?
She doesn #8217;t deserve you. You deserve someone that will be there for you when your there for them. Fuck that hoe
Thank you for the support my guy. It #8217;s just hard to do anything anymore. Like I want to distract my self but also want to lay in my bed for the rest of my life

Do breakups after your first breakup become easier? This is my first breakup and I can #8217;t imagine going though this AGAIN. Also I go to the same school as my ex and have classes with him too so I feel ur pain
Thank you for this advice I #8217;ll try my best to follow it
Thank you so much this really helped me.
3 days ago so it #8217;s still the early stages

I get that sorry I said that. I feel the same way about my ex. I want to hate him but I just can #8217;t. I advise writing everything you feel and use this platform instead of messaging her. I know it #8217;s so so hard I #8217;m going through that same pain but it will make you heal faster. At least I hope it does
Fuck me too. I want to be angry, I want to hate him but I just can #8217;t. Sometimes I wish he cheated on me so I can be more angry not sad
It #8217;s so hard to not be attached anymore. People around me when they go through a breakup say how hard it was to unattach and I never really understood them. This feeling hurts like hell.

WRITING.TITLE: Find your distraction
WRITING.TEXT: I found mine today, a way to stop thinking about him. Me personally painting was my way out. The only thing that has made me feel better was distracting myself with something I can put my whole mind too. It was a great feeling, but once I stopped I fell back in the hole
How long did it take for you to be over him if I may ask?
That #8217;s a really good idea especially because before bed is usually the worst time of the day for me. Thank you :)

This makes me sad because rn I #8217;m like #8220;I #8217;m over him, it only took a couple days wow I #8217;m so happy #8221; but I know that I #8217;ll go back into a hole. It #8217;s a really sad feeling

WRITING.TITLE: I haven #8217;t cried at all today
WRITING.TEXT: Today was surprisingly really good. I haven #8217;t cried, I talked to my ex because he reached out. I #8217;m not sure if it was a good idea to respond but it made me feel a lot better to know he genuinely wants to keep a relationship with me even if we #8217;re just friends. I talked to someone going through a breakup also and it feels so good to talk to someone that really knows and feels what I #8217;m talking about. My friends are supportive but it #8217;s just not the same you know. I feel like there #8217;s a lot of hope. I haven #8217;t felt this free in a while. This might be a faze and I #8217;ll go back into a sad hole tomorrow but let #8217;s hope it #8217;s not. :)
It #8217;s so hard to not talk to him, it #8217;s even harder when he reached out. What do I do?
Thank you for the support!!! #10084; #65039;

WRITING.TITLE: What do I do someone help me please
WRITING.TEXT: So my ex texted me this morning after making eye contact in school for the first time since he broke up with me. He said he wants to talk after school. What does that mean? Should I keep my hopes up? I he does want to get back together do I take him back? Idk what to do. What if he does this to me again, I wouldn #8217;t be able to handle it. Why did he have to lose me to realized he would miss me. If he doesn #8217;t love me anymore how could his feelings change just like that. It #8217;s so confusing.
Ok thank you for the advice means a lot to me :)
It #8217;s almost like I posted this myself. I just cut myself for the first time ever and I don #8217;t know how to feel
